quest_name: Water Sprinkler of Nem Ankh (Cleric Epic 1.0)

steps.description: Go to Lake Rathetear and camp Lord Bergurgle. Loot Lord Bergurgle’s Crown.

Give Lord Bergurgle’s Crown to Shmendrik Lavawalker in Lake Rathetear to spawn Natasha Whitewater. Kill Shmendrik Lavawalker and loot Damaged Goblin Crown. Give Damaged Goblin Crown to Natasha Whitewater to receive Ornate Sea Shell.
Give Ornate Sea Shell to Omat Vastsea in Timorous Deep to receive Coral Statue of Tarew.
Give Coral Statue of Tarew to a seeker in Temple of Solusek Ro to spawn a plasmatic priest. Kill a plasmatic priest and loot Blood Soaked Plasmatic Priest Robe.
Kill Lord Gimblox in Solusek’s Eye and loot Lord Gimblox’s Signet Ring.
Give Blood Soaked Plasmatic Priest Robe to Omat Vastsea in Timorous Deep to receive Orb of Frozen Water. Give Lord Gimblox’s Signet Ring to Natasha Whitewater to receive Ornate Sea Shell.
Give Ornate Sea Shell to Naxot Deepwater in Burning Woods to receive Message to Natasha.
Kill Ixiblat Fer in Burning Woods and loot Sceptre of Ixiblat Fer.
Loot Singed Scroll from Overking Bathezid in Chardok.
Give Sceptre of Ixiblat Fer and Singed Scroll to Omat Vastsea in Timorous Deep to receive Orb of Clear Water.
Give Message to Natasha to Natasha Whitewater in Timorous Deep to receive Shimmering Pearl.
Give Shimmering Pearl to Zordak Ragefire in Nagafen’s Lair to spawn Zordakalicus Ragefire. Kill Zordakalicus Ragefire and loot Heart of Zordak Ragefire.
Give Heart of Zordak Ragefire to Omat Vastsea in Timorous Deep to receive Orb of Vapor.
Give Orb of Frozen Water, Orb of Clear Water, and Orb of Vapor to Omat Vastsea in Timorous Deep to receive Water Sprinkler of Nem Ankh.
